name: Disrupting Fear-Based Energy Harvesting
description: Neutralizing tactics that exploit fear and suffering as a source of energy extraction.

cards.title: Identifying Fear-Inducing Triggers
cards.description: Recognizing engineered fear responses designed to keep populations in a low vibrational state.
bulletpoints: Understanding media-driven fear programming and psychological operations.
Identifying anxiety-inducing symbols and subliminal triggers in daily life.
Decoding the use of traumatic world events as collective energy siphons.

cards.title: Psychological Armor Against Fear Manipulation
cards.description: Techniques to nullify emotional hijacking and break free from imposed fear states.
bulletpoints: Developing mental resilience to reject imposed fear-based narratives.
Utilizing controlled breathing and visualization to override panic triggers.
Reframing fear-driven messaging into empowerment-based perspectives.

cards.title: Dismantling Fear-Based Social Constructs
cards.description: Challenging societal structures that reinforce fear and control.
bulletpoints: Analyzing historical and modern fear-based control mechanisms.
Exposing how mass fear creates compliance and submission.
Rebuilding personal sovereignty through cognitive rewiring.
